channel.title: Softlayer_user_external_binding_vendor on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_user_external_binding_vendor on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor service is used to retrieve a list of available 3rd party vendors that SoftLayer supports for external bindings. Methods getAllObjects Get a list of all available external binding vendors that SoftLayer supports. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor record.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor Datatype Description The SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor data type contains information for a single external binding vendor. This information includes a user friendly vendor name, a unique version of the vendor name, and a unique internal identifier that can be used when creating a new external binding. Local id The unique identifier for an external binding vendor. Type: integer keyName A unique version of the name property.

item.title: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor

This information includes a user friendly vendor name, a unique version of the vendor name, and a unique internal identifier that can be used when creating a new external binding. Local id The unique identifier for an external binding vendor. Type: integer keyName A unique version of the name property.

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor::getAllObjects Overview getAllObjects() will return a list of the available external binding vendors that SoftLayer supports. Use this list to select the appropriate vendor when creating a new external binding. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_VendorObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_VendorObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor::getObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_VendorInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_VendorObjectMask SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_VendorObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_User_External_Binding_Vendor
